name: WebGLRenderingContext.detachShader
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.detachShader() method of the WebGL API detaches a previously attached WebGLShader from a WebGLProgram.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'detachShader' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glDetachShader' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
